channel.title: Modules on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Modules on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: autoupgrade
item.description: Known bugs (8 campaigns / 4 issues) .github/workflows/ui-test/nightly.json : PrestaShop#36958 : Autoupgrade : Some modules are disabled after upgrade to major or minor version .github/workflows/ui-test/sanity.json : PrestaShop#36425 : Autoupgrade : PSCheckout trigger an error with 1.7.7.0-7.1-apache (and all 1.7.7.x) tests/UI/campaigns/sanity/02_productsBO/02_CRUDStandardProduct.spec.ts : PrestaShop#36097 : Edit Product Page : The menu hide a part of the page in tablet mode tests/UI/campaigns/sanity/02_productsBO/03_CRUDProductWithCombinations.spec.ts : PrestaShop#36097 : Edit Product Page : The menu hide a part of the page in tablet mode tests/UI/campaigns/sanity/02_productsBO/04_CRUDVirtualProduct.

item.title: blockwishlist
item.description: Known bugs (2 campaigns / 2 issues) tests/UI/campaigns/02_configuration/02_statisticsTabSettings.spec.ts : PrestaShop#33374 : Blockwislist v3.0 : Call to a member function formatNumber() on null tests/UI/campaigns/03_frontOffice/02_products/01_addProductToList.spec.ts : PrestaShop#36496 : Page “My wishlists” - Sort “Last added” doesn’t work
